attributes.title: I hate it 0/10
attributes.review: Don’t recommend at all when i first downloaded it my phone blew up. So then i went to the store to get a new one it also blew up.

attributes.title: WILL GIVE YOUR PHONE VIRUSES
attributes.review: This app is just a glitch. Stole all of my data and information and sold it, caused viruses on my phone and basically broke it. This app is trash save yourself time and don’t even download

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: The worst app I have EVER downloaded- had to delete it w in 5min bc it started putting viruses on my phone and made it glitch :/ ALSO when you open the app the first thing u see is an icky pic of trump (def needs a TRIGGER WARNING!!)

attributes.title: really super extremely bad

attributes.review: Very bad I downloaded it and just seconds later it was already ruining my life like what kind of app does this. Trump has lost my vote he’s a very very very bad man. I can’t believe I even considered downloading it😑😭🤯🤯🤯🤯😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Im definitely 100% a trump supporter
attributes.review: This app was extremely under satisfactory. As a “trump supporter” I was definitely expecting more from this app, the fact that there is no truth in anything it says and stands for is disgusting. #votetrumpout #goblue #bluetidalwave

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I tried to submit a survey from an ad in this but it did not submit I request for your manager NOW. Also trump doesn’t design this app hood so I am to leave a bad reviews

attributes.title: Unsafe and unsatisfied
attributes.review: I wanted to get all of that fake news out of my life so I got the Trump app only to find out that it gave me a virus. I am unsatisfied with the way this app functions and I don’t want it on the App Store.
